name: Underground (itch) (JayJayJay1747)
description: This is my bad and boring mining game. Looking for ways to spice it up and add something to it so if you have any ideas or find a bug email me @Jaygametutorials17@gmail.com. This is still a very early version of the game. it took me under 4 hours to make so don't judge too harshly and like I said I'm looking for ways to make it more fun and enjoyable.  Also as a way to spice it up, try to go fast. your goal is to get to 100 gems so go ahead and speedrun it!
